channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Roger Counihan Blog

item.title: November Trips to Nottely Cottage
item.description: We closed on a new cottage on Lake Nottely in North Georgia two weeks ago, and have started to spend our spare weekend time up there. It is a very small cottage, with a beautiful view of a mountain and the water. It has multiple balconies and patios which we will likely spend a significant amount of our time on. The inside is currently fairly dark, with the exception of the master bedroom.
